# 6. Exercises

## Test Your Knowledge: Visualization Libraries

**Question 1**<br>
*Which function do we need to use to superimpose plots in Altair?*

a) Overlay
a) Layer
a) Panel


::: {.callout-tip title="Solution" collapse="true"}
The correct answer is **"Layer"**.
:::

**Question 2**<br>
*Line plots are often preferable to point plots when visualizing trends over time becauseâ€¦*

a) The lines make the plot more visually appealing.
a) Line plots are faster to create.
a) The line makes it easy to see which values are connected in the same group and its slope facilitates our interpretation of the overall trend.

::: {.callout-tip title="Solution" collapse="true"}
The answer choice **"c"** is correct. Explanation for the incorrect answer choices:

- "The lines make the plot more visually appealing.": There is more to plots then just being visually appealing.<br>
- "Line plots are faster to create.": They both take approximately the same time to create..<br>
:::
